name: Jergens Natural Glow Instant Sun Body Mousse, Self Tanner for Light Bronze Tan, Sunless Tanning Body Bronzer, Fake Tan for Fair to Medium Skin, 6 Ounce
about_this_item: FLAWLESS SELF TANNER - Create a flawless, quick tan with gradual, natural-looking color for gorgeous skin and blended color for fair to medium skin.
INSTANT SUNLESS TANNING - Lightweight, airy tanning mousse enhances your natural skin tone to mimic results from the sun.
NATURAL BODY BRONZER - Develop your tone instantly, and watch it deepen within hours of application for steak-free results. Use the next day for deeper color.
TROPICAL, FRUITY SCENT - Jergens Natural Glow Mousse gives you an island escape with its tropical, fruity fragrance.
EASY, FAST-DRYING APPLICATION - Applied by hand or sunless tanning mitt, our self tanning mousse is tinted for precise application, and it dries in just 60 seconds.
